trans-unit.source: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory Integration with SmarterU | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory Integration with SmarterU | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use SmarterU with Azure Active Directory to enable single sign-on, automated provisioning, and more!.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use SmarterU with Azure Active Directory to enable single sign-on, automated provisioning, and more!.

trans-unit.source: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory Integration with SmarterU
trans-unit.target: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory Integration with SmarterU

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.TIP]For feedback, click [here](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=524463).
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.TIP]For feedback, click [here](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=524463).

trans-unit.source: The objective of this tutorial is to show the integration of Azure and SmarterU.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this tutorial is to show the integration of Azure and SmarterU.

trans-unit.source: The scenario outlined in this tutorial assumes that you already have the following items:
trans-unit.target: The scenario outlined in this tutorial assumes that you already have the following items:

trans-unit.source: A valid Azure subscription
trans-unit.target: A valid Azure subscription

trans-unit.source: A SmarterU tenant
trans-unit.target: A SmarterU tenant

trans-unit.source: After completing this tutorial, the Azure AD users you have assigned to SmarterU will be able to single sign into the application at your SmarterU company site (service provider initiated sign on), or using the [Introduction to the Access Panel](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn308586)
trans-unit.target: After completing this tutorial, the Azure AD users you have assigned to SmarterU will be able to single sign into the application at your SmarterU company site (service provider initiated sign on), or using the [Introduction to the Access Panel](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn308586)

trans-unit.source: The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of the following building blocks:
trans-unit.target: The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of the following building blocks:

trans-unit.source: Enabling the application integration for SmarterU
trans-unit.target: Enabling the application integration for SmarterU

trans-unit.source: Configuring single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configuring single sign-on

trans-unit.source: Configuring user provisioning
trans-unit.target: Configuring user provisioning

trans-unit.source: Assigning users
trans-unit.target: Assigning users

trans-unit.source: Scenario
trans-unit.target: Scenario

trans-unit.source: Enabling the application integration for SmarterU
trans-unit.target: Enabling the application integration for SmarterU

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable the application integration for SmarterU.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable the application integration for SmarterU.

trans-unit.source: To enable the application integration for SmarterU, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To enable the application integration for SmarterU, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click **Active Directory**.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click **Active Directory**.

trans-unit.source: Active Directory
trans-unit.target: Active Directory

trans-unit.source: From the **Directory** list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.
trans-unit.target: From the **Directory** list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.

trans-unit.source: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click **Applications** in the top menu.
trans-unit.target: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click **Applications** in the top menu.

trans-unit.source: Applications
trans-unit.target: Applications

trans-unit.source: Click **Add** at the bottom of the page.
trans-unit.target: Click **Add** at the bottom of the page.

trans-unit.source: Add application
trans-unit.target: Add application

trans-unit.source: On the **What do you want to do** dialog, click **Add an application from the gallery**.
trans-unit.target: On the **What do you want to do** dialog, click **Add an application from the gallery**.

trans-unit.source: Add an application from gallerry
trans-unit.target: Add an application from gallerry

trans-unit.source: In the **search box**, type **SmarterU**.
trans-unit.target: In the **search box**, type **SmarterU**.

trans-unit.source: Application fallery
trans-unit.target: Application fallery

trans-unit.source: In the results pane, select **SmarterU**, and then click **Complete** to add the application.
trans-unit.target: In the results pane, select **SmarterU**, and then click **Complete** to add the application.

trans-unit.source: SmarterU
trans-unit.target: SmarterU

trans-unit.source: Configuring single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configuring single sign-on

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable users to authenticate to SmarterU with their account in Azure AD using federation based on the SAML protocol.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable users to authenticate to SmarterU with their account in Azure AD using federation based on the SAML protocol.

trans-unit.source: To configure single sign-on, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To configure single sign-on, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: In the Azure AD portal, on the **SmarterU** application integration page, click **Configure single sign-on** to open the **Configure Single Sign On ** dialog.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure AD portal, on the **SmarterU** application integration page, click **Configure single sign-on** to open the **Configure Single Sign On ** dialog.

trans-unit.source: Configure Single Sign-On
trans-unit.target: Configure Single Sign-On

trans-unit.source: On the **How would you like users to sign on to SmarterU** page, select **Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On**, and then click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: On the **How would you like users to sign on to SmarterU** page, select **Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On**, and then click **Next**.

trans-unit.source: Configure Single Sign-On
trans-unit.target: Configure Single Sign-On

trans-unit.source: On the **Configure single sign-on at SmarterU** page, to download your metadata, click **Download metadata**, and then the data file locally as **c:\\SmarterUMetaData.cer**.
trans-unit.target: On the **Configure single sign-on at SmarterU** page, to download your metadata, click **Download metadata**, and then the data file locally as **c:\\SmarterUMetaData.cer**.

trans-unit.source: Configure Single Sign-On
trans-unit.target: Configure Single Sign-On

trans-unit.source: In a different web browser window, log into your SmarterU company site as an administrator.
trans-unit.target: In a different web browser window, log into your SmarterU company site as an administrator.

trans-unit.source: In the toolbar on the top, click **Account Settings**.
trans-unit.target: In the toolbar on the top, click **Account Settings**.

trans-unit.source: Account Settings
trans-unit.target: Account Settings

trans-unit.source: On the account configuration page, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: On the account configuration page, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: External Authorization
trans-unit.target: External Authorization

trans-unit.source: Select **Enable External Authorization**.
trans-unit.target: Select **Enable External Authorization**.

trans-unit.source: In the **Master Login Control** section, select the **SmarterU** tab.
trans-unit.target: In the **Master Login Control** section, select the **SmarterU** tab.

trans-unit.source: In the **User Default Login** section, select the **SmarterU** tab.
trans-unit.target: In the **User Default Login** section, select the **SmarterU** tab.

trans-unit.source: Select **Enable Okta**.
trans-unit.target: Select **Enable Okta**.

trans-unit.source: Copy the content of the downloaded metadata file, and then paste it into the **Okta Metadata** textbox.
trans-unit.target: Copy the content of the downloaded metadata file, and then paste it into the **Okta Metadata** textbox.

trans-unit.source: Click **Save**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Save**.

trans-unit.source: On the Azure AD portal, select the single sign-on configuration confirmation, and then click **Complete** to close the **Configure Single Sign On** dialog.
trans-unit.target: On the Azure AD portal, select the single sign-on configuration confirmation, and then click **Complete** to close the **Configure Single Sign On** dialog.

trans-unit.source: Configure Single Sign-On
trans-unit.target: Configure Single Sign-On

trans-unit.source: Configuring user provisioning
trans-unit.target: Configuring user provisioning

trans-unit.source: In order to enable Azure AD users to log into SmarterU, they must be provisioned into SmarterU.
trans-unit.target: In order to enable Azure AD users to log into SmarterU, they must be provisioned into SmarterU.

trans-unit.source: In the case of SmarterU, provisioning is a manual task.
trans-unit.target: In the case of SmarterU, provisioning is a manual task.

trans-unit.source: To provision a user accounts, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To provision a user accounts, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: Log in to your **SmarterU** tenant.
trans-unit.target: Log in to your **SmarterU** tenant.

trans-unit.source: Go to **Users**.
trans-unit.target: Go to **Users**.

trans-unit.source: In the user section, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: In the user section, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: New User
trans-unit.target: New User

trans-unit.source: Click **+User**.
trans-unit.target: Click **+User**.

trans-unit.source: Type the related attribute values of the Azure AD user account into the following textboxes: **Primary Email**, **Employee ID**, **Password**, **Verify Password**, **Given Name**, **Surname**.
trans-unit.target: Type the related attribute values of the Azure AD user account into the following textboxes: **Primary Email**, **Employee ID**, **Password**, **Verify Password**, **Given Name**, **Surname**.

trans-unit.source: Click **Active**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Active**.

trans-unit.source: Click **Save**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Save**.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] You can use any other SmarterU user account creation tools or APIs provided by SmarterU to provision AAD user accounts.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] You can use any other SmarterU user account creation tools or APIs provided by SmarterU to provision AAD user accounts.

trans-unit.source: Assigning users
trans-unit.target: Assigning users

trans-unit.source: To test your configuration, you need to grant the Azure AD users you want to allow using your application access to it by assigning them.
trans-unit.target: To test your configuration, you need to grant the Azure AD users you want to allow using your application access to it by assigning them.

trans-unit.source: To assign users to SmarterU, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To assign users to SmarterU, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: In the Azure AD portal, create a test account.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure AD portal, create a test account.

trans-unit.source: On the **SmarterU **application integration page, click **Assign users**.
trans-unit.target: On the **SmarterU **application integration page, click **Assign users**.

trans-unit.source: Assign Users
trans-unit.target: Assign Users

trans-unit.source: Select your test user, click **Assign**, and then click **Yes** to confirm your assignment.
trans-unit.target: Select your test user, click **Assign**, and then click **Yes** to confirm your assignment.

trans-unit.source: Yes
trans-unit.target: Yes

trans-unit.source: If you want to test your single sign-on settings, open the Access Panel.
trans-unit.target: If you want to test your single sign-on settings, open the Access Panel.

trans-unit.source: For more details about the Access Panel, see [Introduction to the Access Panel](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn308586).
trans-unit.target: For more details about the Access Panel, see [Introduction to the Access Panel](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn308586).

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
